channel.title: admin on Damián Blasi
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Damián Blasi

item.description: I am a postdoctoral researcher at the Comparative Linguistics Department at the University of Zürich (Switzerland) and a research affiliate of the Department of Linguistic and Cultural Evolution at the Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History in Jena (Germany), where I am also an external faculty to the IMPRS Ph.D. program. I also hold two external positions: research associate to the Human Relations Area Files at Yale University (USA) and senior researcher at the Quantitative Linguistics Laboratory in Kazan Federal University (Russia).
